description:
Kyururu falls into the ocean along with the sketchbook and loses consciousness, but is saved by two bird Friends. However, Serval and Caracal, who had rushed to save Kyururu, warn of a new approaching danger. Kyururu feels responsible for being a part of the cause of this new dilemma. Meanwhile, Passenger Pigeon goes missing while in pursuit of a Cerulean...
Source: crunchyroll
